Uxq1X2nimewoG0ACiGu4jw.text: Pictured is the "Mixed Platter for 2" starter which was delicious and plenty for both of us.  For our main course we selected Lamb Tikka, Khushab Kharahi, with a side order of garlic naan. Both dishes were filling although lacking in flavorful spices to which I added a generous helping of salt.  Overall a great visit!

G7_-5NeiJcOFsTLW0qe6Rw.text: We came here with a group of 17. I was tasked with finding a Indian restaurant for our group and had read good things on tripadvisor of ronaq. They were very responsive via email and welcomed our large group. The restaurant is gorgeous and the food was excellent. Further more the service and presentation was top notch. I highly recommend giving them a try if you are in the mood for Indian. We tried so many wonderful things and many of the options are offered in smaller taste portions so you can really mix together a wonderful taste menu. I highly recommend this upscale hi-end restaurant.

Maenmelu915CDzhswraA4w.text: In response to the reply from the proprietor, this is absolutely not fabricated!  I cannot imagine why anyone would do so!  It is my recollection that we were served alcohol.  Perhaps the BYOB was introduced since our visit.  Interesting that there were no comments on the rest of the issues...just an attempt to discredit the review they didn't like.
